subject: maybe it's the best time
body:
Hello, my gentleman

Love is a gift of heavens. And love is the key to heavens. Do you
want to find that key with me?
I am a lady who is tender and careful in her soul, has pretty face and
good body, I am looking for a reasonable man to create a family.
I am looking for he one who will support and take care of me, and I
will give him the tenderness of a woman's heart!
Let's search the Love key together! 
See more about me here http://loveandonly.com/winking


Looking forward to hear from you soon
Tanya
